section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the “Qualified Zone Academy Revenue Bond Project Forward Commitment Approval Act of 2005”.

annotations.annotation: Resolution 17-495, the “Qualified Zone Academy Revenue Bonds Project Approval Resolution of 2008”, was approved effective January 8, 2008.
Delegation of Authority—Qualified Zone Academy Revenue Bond Project Forward Commitment Approval Act of 2005, see Mayor’s Order 2007-93, April 13, 2007 ( 54 DCR 8873).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see §§ 2 to 18 of Qualified Zone Academy Revenue Bond Project Forward Commitment Approval Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-143, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7171).
